backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact form submissions in a map with functions to submit, list, and fetch by name.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking typography-related features to modified frontend CSS and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing major React components, pages, and shared utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining build steps, verification checklists, and backend contact form details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining color tokens, theme variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all site routes using SiteLayout as the root layout.
frontend/src/components/common/Container: Simple wrapper component providing consistent responsive layout spacing.
frontend/src/components/common/GradientB: Transparent structural wrapper preserving layout spacing without applying gradients.
Reusable info card component with optional icon, title, description, and content slot.
frontend/src/components/common/ProfilePo: Portrait component rendering a styled circular image with gradient glow effects.
frontend/src/components/common/RightSide: Empty placeholder file for a portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionCo: Empty placeholder file for a corner portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionMe: Empty placeholder file for a medium portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/ShareSite: Card allowing users to copy or open the site's URL using clipboard and link buttons.
frontend/src/components/common/Waterfall: Renders static waterfall background and overlay layers for page visuals.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form component handling input validation, submission via custom hook, and error states.
frontend/src/components/contact/SubmitSt: Displays success or error alerts after submitting the contact form.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with name, description, CTAs, and highlight stats.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive site header with navigation links and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, quick links, contact prompt, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout combining header, footer, background video, and main outlet.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Category filter using tabs to switch visible project types.
Grid displaying project cards with descriptions, tools, and optional links.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillCate: Card grouping skill meters under a category title.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillMete: Shows a skill name and percentage using a progress bar.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines project data array with titles, descriptions, categories, tools, and links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
Defines a mutation that submits contact form data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, typography effects, and background styling for the app.
frontend/src/lib/emailValidation.ts: Exports a simple regex-based email validation function.
frontend/src/lib/portrait.ts: Provides centralized constants for the portrait image source and alt text.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Utility for setting document title and meta tags including Open Graph data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with bio content, highlights, portrait, and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form, contact details, share card, and configures SEO.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home hero section and initializes SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows a filterable projects grid for the portfolio and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with SEO setup, a services list displayed via InfoCard components, and a CTA section.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Renders the Skills page with SEO setup and a grid of categorized skill lists using SkillCategory components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, custom colors, animations, typography, container settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, requirements, known issues, and state for updating and redeploying the portfolio site.
